sentences.en: ...black townships located on the fringes of the city.
sentences.cn: …位于该城市边缘的黑人居住区。

sentences.en: a fringe of woodland
sentences.cn: 一条林带

sentences.en: A line of palm trees fringe the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 游泳池边缘围了一圈棕榈树.

sentences.en: a small group on the fringes of the art world
sentences.cn: 艺术界边缘的一个小群体

sentences.en: a tall girl with straight brown hair and a fringe
sentences.cn: 一头棕色直发、留着刘海的高个子女孩

sentences.en: Fig . 4 . 1 illustrates the fringe formation due to pitch difference.
sentences.cn: 图4-1说明了间距不同所组成的条纹.

sentences.en: It was easier to move about on the fringe of the crowd.
sentences.cn: 在人群外围移动比较容易.

sentences.en: It's the lunatic fringe of the Animal Liberation Front which smashes the windows of butchers'shops, not ordinary members like us.
sentences.cn: 是 “动物解放阵线”的极端分子打碎了肉店的玻璃窗, 可不是我们这样的普通成员.

sentences.en: My fringe needs trimming.
sentences.cn: 我的刘海要修一下.

sentences.en: Remember to use not only the hourly wage, but also include fringe benefits.
sentences.cn: 切记不要仅仅使用小时工资，还要包括附加福利。

sentences.en: She put up her hand and patted her large fringe.
sentences.cn: 她抬起手来理一理她那长长的刘海.

sentences.en: The castle rises in solitary splendor on the fringe of the desert.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡巍然耸立在沙漠的边际，显得十分壮美。

sentences.en: The castle rises in solitary splendour on the fringe of the desert.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡巍然耸立在沙漠的边际,显得十分壮美.

sentences.en: The edge of the carpet was frayed into a fringe.
sentences.cn: 地毯的边缘被散编成一绺绺流苏.

sentences.en: The flowers were a fringe benefit.
sentences.cn: 这些鲜花可算是额外的报酬.

sentences.en: The girl wears her hair in a fringe.
sentences.cn: 那女孩留着刘海.

sentences.en: The jacket had leather fringes.
sentences.cn: 这件夹克有皮穗。

sentences.en: The monarchists are a small fringe group who quarrel fiercely among themselves.
sentences.cn: 君主制拥护者们是个边缘性小团体，内部争吵激烈。

sentences.en: The resulting distortions in the wavefront generate the fringe contours.
sentences.cn: 波阵面上发生的畸变生成了条纹线.

sentences.en: They lived together in a mixed household on the fringe of a campus.
sentences.cn: 他们一起住在校园边上一处男女合租的房子里。

sentences.en: This city is located on the southern fringe of the desert.
sentences.cn: 这个城市处于沙漠南缘.

words.tran_cn: 具流苏的，具的（等于fringy）；加穗的；带边饰的

phrases.tran_cn: 电视接收边缘区；边缘地区；干扰区域
条纹反差；干涉条纹对比；条纹衬比度条

trans.tran_en: Fringe groups or events are less important or popular than other related groups or events
a decorative edge of hanging threads on a curtain, piece of clothing etc

trans.tran_cn: 作为…的边缘，围绕着，给…加穗饰
trans.tran_en: to be around the edge of something
